channel.title: INfinance

item.title: Why CoreWeave plans to buy Core Scientific — and why both stocks are dropping
item.description: The $9 billion deal is a play on AI power needs, but one analyst thinks the purchase price undervalues Core Scientific’s business and potential.

item.title: What’s next for the stock market? Contrarians have concerns.

item.title: Stocks were flashing this warning signal before tariff jitters drove Dow down 500 points

item.title: 17 bargain dividend stocks that are primed for growth — consider this before you buy
item.description: Companies passing the screen for low valuations, rapid dividend growth and business-expansion prospects include PepsiCo and Occidental Petroleum.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
